landing.heading: we let your dream of flying come true

about.heading: feel free like a bird
about.text: Sky for two is a tandem paragliding company in the region Zell am See / Kaprun. Founded in 20.., the goal was to fullfill peoples dream of the free flight and show them our beautiful region from a bird's eye view.
about.c1: Get the best view of the region
about.c2: Be in good hands, thanks to the best pilots and the latest gear
about.c3: We do our best that you have a good time

pilot.text: With more than 30 years of paragliding expirience Helli is one of the best pilots in the region and you are in good hands.

panorama.heading: Panorama Flight
panorama.duration: Flight duration: 20 minutes

thermal.heading: Thermal Flight
thermal.duration: Flight duration: 45-60 minutes

gift.name: Gift-Certificate
gift.desc: A gift certificate for a Tandem flight is a special present for any occasion. Our gift certificate is availible for the Panorama Flight, Thermal Flight and for our extras.

customer.heading: what our customers think

c3.text: Really enjoyed my first time paragliding , very experienced pilot, could not ask for a better experience, highly recommend them, thanks again

c2.text: It was my first experience in paragliding but it won't be the last. Flying over kaprun on a sunny day was a great deal with the best pilot. I strongly recommend you to try this adventure, you will love it.

c1.text: We enjoyed the flying so much! The view was awesome and we're never gonna forget this! Thanks for this amazing experience!

customer.social: You want to share your expirience about your flight with us? We would love to hear from you

booking.heading: Book your flight now
booking.subject: Product
booking.send: Send booking request

procedure.heading: Procedure
procedure.text1: After you booked your flight and the pilot confirmed that the weather conditions are flyable,
procedure.text2: you'll meet with the pilot at the office and you have to fill out a ticket for your flight. Please be punctual, we have a very strict timetable and can't garuante your flight if you are late!
procedure.text3: After you filled out your ticket, you'll drive with the pilot to the cable-car and get up to the top of the Schmittenh√∂he.
procedure.text4: On top the pilot will check the equiment and gives you a short security briefing. Then you are ready to take off and enjoy the view. The pilot will take pictures and a video of the flight.
procedure.text5: After your save landing in the field next to the office, we will do the payment of the flight.

price.heading: Prices & Payment
price.text1: Our Prices for the Tandem Flights do not include the price for the cablecar. You can find the current prices here.
price.text2: We only accept cash at our office.

wyn.heading: Things you need for your flight
